author: Nintendo of America
description:
Hello Kitty Island Adventure Nintendo Switch 2 Edition is now available: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/hello-kitty-island-adventure-nintendo-switch-2-edition-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01  

Celebrating, customizing, and crafting never looked so good! The beloved cozy adventure that captured the world is now on Nintendo Switch 2. Dive into a world of friendship, fun, and discovery alongside Hello Kitty and Friends as you decorate your island to your heart's content. 

#HelloKittyIslandAdventure #NintendoSwitch2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Hello Kitty Island Adventure Nintendo Switch 2 Edition – Launch Trailer

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Demonschool is now available on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/demonschool-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01  

Demonschool is a new-style tactics RPG where motion equals action. Defeat big weirdos in between the human and demon worlds as Faye and her misfit companions, while navigating university life on a mysterious island. 

#NintendoSwitch #Demonschool  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s
